title: Improve startup/login responsiveness (reduce blocking loading and delays)

requirements.text: Remove or significantly reduce any UI that blocks the app for a fixed time on startup when the user is already authenticated (restored session), so the main Home screen becomes usable immediately.

quotes: Όταν συνδέομαι στην εφαρμογή ή όταν την ανοίγω συνδεδεμένος να λειτουργει άμεσα ομαλά χωρίς καθυστερήσεις loading

acceptanceCriteria: When the app is opened with an already-authenticated Internet Identity session, the Home screen renders immediately without a forced full-screen splash/intro delay.
Any remaining intro/splash experience (if kept) must not block interaction with the main screen for a fixed duration.

requirements.text: Make authenticated startup feel smooth by using progressive rendering for initial data (folders/files/missions): keep the UI responsive while data loads and avoid showing a full-page loading spinner during normal authenticated startup.

quotes: ...να λειτουργει άμεσα ομαλά χωρίς καθυστερήσεις loading

acceptanceCriteria: On authenticated startup, the app shows the main layout immediately and displays lightweight skeleton/placeholder states within sections that are still loading (instead of a full-page blocking loader).
Floating action buttons and primary navigation do not appear ‘stuck’ in a loading state during normal actor initialization; if temporarily disabled, the UI clearly remains responsive.

requirements.text: Add opt-in performance timing logs for the startup path (identity restoration, actor initialization, and first successful data fetches) using the existing performance diagnostics utility, to help verify improvements and detect regressions.
acceptanceCriteria: When performance diagnostics are enabled (via the existing localStorage/URL flag), console timings are emitted for: identity initialization, actor initialization to ready, and the first completion of initial folders/files/missions queries.
When diagnostics are not enabled, there is no additional console noise and negligible runtime overhead.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify any frontend paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; only add backend changes if strictly necessary for perceived startup speed.
nonGoals: Adding real-time features (websockets) or external caching services.
Changing authentication provider (must remain Internet Identity).
Large redesign of the app’s feature set beyond startup/loading responsiveness.
